statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); branch=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && branch=" ($branch)"; ctx_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 0'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage // empty'); if [ -n "$usage" ] && [ "$ctx_size" -gt 0 ]; then tokens=$(echo "$usage" | jq '(.input_tokens // 0) + (.cache_creation_input_tokens // 0) + (.cache_read_input_tokens // 0)'); pct=$((tokens * 100 / ctx_size)); printf "\033[33m%s\033[35m%s\033[31m nate \033[36m[%d%%]\033[0m" "$dir:" "$branch" "$pct"; else printf "\033[33m%s\033[35m%s\033[31m nate\033[0m" "$dir:" "$branch"; fi
